=3Dtop>You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:<BR><BR=

vidence you provide.<BR><BR>3) Why are negative people on

ething interesting going on with the technology, I would not have been so i=
nsistent that you give your information to the police.  How could a pe=
rson, of good conscience, not prompt you to give that information to the po=
lice?  Again how is that a negative thing to do?<BR><BR>Wouldn't the r=
eally negative thing be to ignore it?<BR><BR><BR><BR><BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue,=

nts.  So if you want to know what people really hear without your hint=
